text: A o ko o akanye gore kotlhao e e setlhogo e tlaa wela go le kae ba ba gatakileng Morwa Modimo ka dinao, ba bo ba kaya madi a gagwe a a ntlafatsang jaaka ekete ke selonyana fela a bile a se boitshepo, ba bo ba tlhapatsa ba gakatsa Mowa O O Boitshepo o o lereng kutlwelo botlhoko ya Modimo kwa bathong ba One.
